message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage compared to the market value of $800,000. We look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Given its market value, I'm willing to offer $800,000 for it. This price reflects the fair market value and allows for a mutually beneficial transaction.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose adjusting the price to $875,000. This offer still reflects the value of the product while providing some flexibility for both parties involved.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $875,000 is still a bit higher than my ideal price point.  I'm confident that $800,000 accurately reflects the market value and allows for a fair and mutually beneficial transaction.  I'm ready to finalize the deal at this price.
